meanings.definition: The recording, reproducing, or broadcasting of moving visual images.
meanings.sent1: I watched a funny video on my phone.
meanings.sent2: The video of the birthday party captured all the fun moments.
meanings.sent3: The video of the cat dancing made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a bright video.
meanings.sent5: The video of the waterfall was so clear, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: A movie or other piece of material recorded on videotape.
meanings.sent1: We rented a video to watch tonight.
meanings.sent2: The video we borrowed from the library was a classic film.
meanings.sent3: The video we picked turned out to be a hilarious comedy.
meanings.sent4: His life story played out like a dramatic video.
meanings.sent5: The video we found online had amazing special effects.
